name: DataTable
description: Advanced data grid with virtualization, sorting, filtering, pagination, and row selection

accessibility.screenReader: Uses role=region with 'Data table' label. Sortable columns announce sort state changes via live region. Row selection is announced. Loading state uses aria-busy. Pagination controls have accessible labels.
knownLimitations: Complex keyboard navigation within cells may require additional implementation for editable cells

recommendedUsage: Use for displaying large datasets with interactive features. Enable virtualization for performance with many rows. Provide clear column headers and accessible captions.
antiPatterns: Do not use for simple lists - use List or Table instead. Avoid hiding essential data in horizontal scroll. Ensure mobile-friendly alternatives for complex tables.
